name: Green Reaper (Troll Hitbox Game Studio)
description:
"Harvesting flesh is....I don't know...it just doesn't feel right" - clamored Reaperto

"But you must, as it is your unwilling duty. Resist it and be banished to the realm of the Devs" - said Leorick, the Skeleton King

"I accept my duty. But, you must know, my scythe will never slice flesh, for I am the GREEN REAPER!"

--------

Welcome to the Green Reaper! The latest scramble by Troll HitBox (@TrollHitbox).

Play as Reaperto, the Green Reaper who refuses to harvest human souls and instead will harvest vegetable souls. Play to harvest as many souls as you can before the timer runs out!

All art and code was made from scratch for the Ludum Dare 53 (Jam category). Hope you enjoy it! All feedback is highly appreciated.

Drop your highscore in the comments below :)
